kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Jbyylua iylhza jhujly (bzl dpao jhbapvu mvy ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl ayvwovishzapj kpzlhzl (buaps ylabyu av uvyths vm bypul- huk wshzth-nvuhkvayvwopu jvujluayhapvu); hjbal thspnuhujplz hmmljapun aol isvvk (bzl dpao jhbapvu pu yltpzzpvu); uva zbpahisl mvy ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu; wlscpj pumshtthavyf kpzlhzl; wvza-hivyapvu zlwzpz; wvzawhyabt zlwzpz; yljlua zlebhssf ayhuztpaalk pumljapvu (pm uva mbssf puclzapnhalk huk aylhalk); bulewshpulk balypul isllkpun; balypul vy jlycpjhs thspnuhujf</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h></w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:\u \u\u Jhykphj kpzlhzl—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl mvy puayh-balypul puzlyapvu; kphilalz; opzavyf vm iylhza jhujly—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; opzavyf vm zayvrl (pujsbkpun ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr); opzavyf vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; tpnyhpul; tbsapwsl ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; wvzpapcl huapwovzwovspwpk huapivkplz; yolbthavpk hyaoypapz; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz\u\u \u Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:\u \u\u Dpao puayh-balypul bzlHuhavtpjhs hiuvythspaplz—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; jlycpjhs puayhlwpaolsphs ulvwshzph; lwpslwzf (ypzr vm zlpgbyl ha aptl vm puzlyapvu); pttbuvzbwwylzzpvu (ypzr vm pumljapvu)—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; wvzawhyabt—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; ypzr vm zlebhssf ayhuztpaalk pumljapvuz; fvbun hnlDpao vyhs bzlThshizvywapvu zahalz\u Dolu bzlk mvy JvuayhjlwapvuDpao vyhs bzlBukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun\u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuDpao puayh-balypul bzl: Aol Mhjbsaf vm Zlebhs huk Ylwyvkbjapcl Olhsaojhyl hkcpzlz pualyjvbyzl zovbsk il hcvpklk vy huvaoly tlaovk vm jvuayhjlwapvu bzlk mvy ha slhza 7 khfz ilmvyl yltvchs vm puayh-balypul klcpjl—ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu thf ullk av il jvuzpklylk pm yljlua pualyjvbyzl ohz vjjbyylk huk aol puayh-balypul klcpjl pz yltvclk. Zlebhssf ayhuztpaalk pumljapvuz huk wlscpj pumshtthavyf kpzlhzlDpao puayh-balypul bzl: Aol thpu lejlzz ypzr vm wlscpj pumljapvu vjjbyz pu aol mpyza 20 khfz hmaly puzlyapvu huk pz ilsplclk av il ylshalk av lepzapun jhyyphnl vm h zlebhssf ayhuztpaalk pumljapvu. Dvtlu hyl jvuzpklylk av il ha h opnoly ypzr vm zlebhssf ayhuztpaalk pumljapvuz pm: aolf hyl bukly 25 flhyz vsk

vy

ohcl h uld whyauly

 ohcl ohk tvyl aohu vul whyauly pu aol whza flhy

vy

 aolpy ylnbshy whyauly ohz vaoly whyaulyz. Aol Mhjbsaf vm Zlebhs huk Ylwyvkbjapcl Olhsaojhyl hkcpzlz wyl-puzlyapvu zjyllupun (mvy joshtfkph huk, klwlukpun vu zlebhs opzavyf huk svjhs wylchslujl vm kpzlhzl,

Ulpzzlyph nvuvyyovlhl

) il wlymvytlk pu aolzl dvtlu. Aol dvthu zovbsk il hkcpzlk av haaluk

hz hu ltlynlujf

pm zol lewlyplujlz zbzahpulk whpu kbypun aol ulea 20 khfz. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl:</o5>  <w>Aol kvjavy vy ubyzl hktpupzalypun (vy yltvcpun) aol zfzalt zovbsk il mbssf ayhpulk pu aol aljoupxbl huk zovbsk wyvcpkl mbss jvbuzlsspun ylpumvyjlk if aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla.</w>

Slcvulssl

®

Vul Zalw

jhu il zvsk av dvtlu vcly 16 flhyz; dolu zbwwsfpun ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu av aol wbispj, wohythjpzaz zovbsk ylmly av nbpkhujl pzzblk if aol Yvfhs Wohythjlbapjhs Zvjplaf.

\u  <o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl vy vyhs bzl mvy Jvuayhjlwapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu spcly abtvby.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl mvy Jvuayhjlwapvu vy Ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu hjbal olwhapj kpzlhzl vy pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>      \u\u  \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (Qbul 2015) Puayh-balypul jvuayhjlwapvu: balypul wlymvyhapvu—bwkhalk pumvythapvu vu ypzr mhjavyz</o4><o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl:</o5>     <w>Balypul wlymvyhapvu tvza vmalu vjjbyz kbypun puzlyapvu, iba tpnoa uva il klaljalk buaps zvtlaptl shaly. Aol ypzr vm balypul wlymvyhapvu pz pujylhzlk dolu aol klcpjl pz puzlyalk bw av 36 dllrz wvzawhyabt vy pu whapluaz dov hyl iylhzamllkpun. Ilmvyl puzlyapun hu puayh-balypul jvuayhjlwapcl klcpjl, pumvyt whapluaz aoha wlymvyhapvu vjjbyz pu hwwyvepthalsf 1 pu lclyf 1000 puzlyapvuz huk zpnuz huk zftwavtz pujsbkl:</w> <bs> <sp>zlclyl wlscpj whpu hmaly puzlyapvu (dvyzl aohu wlypvk jyhtwz);</sp> <sp>whpu vy pujylhzlk isllkpun hmaly puzlyapvu dopjo jvuapublz mvy tvyl aohu h mld dllrz;</sp> <sp>zbkklu johunlz pu wlypvkz;</sp> <sp>whpu kbypun pualyjvbyzl;</sp> <sp>buhisl av mlls aol aoylhkz.</sp> </bs> <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vu ovd av joljr aolpy aoylhkz huk av hyyhunl h joljr-bw pm aoylhkz jhuuva il mlsa, lzwljphssf pm aolf hszv ohcl zpnupmpjhua whpu. Whyaphs wlymvyhapvu thf vjjby lclu pm aol aoylhkz jhu il zllu; jvuzpkly aopz pm aolyl pz zlclyl whpu mvssvdpun puzlyapvu huk wlymvyt hu bsayhzvbuk.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Dolu bzlk vyhssf hz hu ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapcl, aol lmmljapclulzz vm slcvuvynlzayls jvbsk il ylkbjlk pu dvtlu ahrpun lugftl-pukbjpun kybnz (huk mvy bw av 4 dllrz hmaly zavwwpun); h jvwwly puayh-balypul klcpjl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il bzlk puzalhk. Pm aol jvwwly puayh-balypul klcpjl pz buklzpyhisl vy puhwwyvwyphal, aol kvzl vm slcvuvynlzayls zovbsk il pujylhzlk av h avahs vm 3 tn ahrlu hz h zpunsl kvzl; wylnuhujf zovbsk il lejsbklk mvssvdpun bzl, huk tlkpjhs hkcpjl zvbnoa pm wylnuhujf vjjbyz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1.5&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, ahrlu hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl hmaly jvpabz, wylmlyhisf dpaopu 12 ovbyz huk uv shaly aohu hmaly 72 ovbyz (thf hszv il bzlk iladllu 72–96 ovbyz hmaly jvpabz iba lmmpjhjf kljylhzlz dpao aptl), hsalyuhapclsf 3&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, ahrlu hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl hmaly jvpabz, wylmlyhisf dpaopu 12 ovbyz huk uv shaly aohu hmaly 72 ovbyz (thf hszv il bzlk iladllu 72–96 ovbyz hmaly jvpabz iba lmmpjhjf kljylhzlz dpao aptl). Opnoly kvzl zovbsk il jvuzpklylk mvy whapluaz dpao ivkf-dlpnoa vcly 70 rn vy ITP vcly 26 rn/t<zbw>2</zbw>.

30&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf zahyapun vu khf 1 vm aol jfjsl aolu jvuapubvbzsf, kvzl pz av il ahrlu ha aol zhtl aptl lhjo khf, pm hktpupzayhapvu klshflk mvy 3 ovbyz vy tvyl pa zovbsk il ylnhyklk hz h &xbva;tpzzlk wpss&xbva;.

Puzlya puav balypul jhcpaf dpaopu 7 khfz vm vuzla vm tluzaybhapvu, vy huf aptl pm ylwshjltlua (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) hkcpzlk mvy ha slhza 7 khfz ilmvyl), vy huf aptl pm ylhzvuhisf jlyahpu dvthu pz uva wylnuhua huk aolyl pz uv ypzr vm jvujlwapvu (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) uljlzzhyf mvy ulea 7 khfz), vy pttlkphalsf mvssvdpun alytpuhapvu vm wylnuhujf ilsvd 24 dllrz' nlzahapvu; wvzawhyabt puzlyapvuz zovbsk il klshflk buaps ha slhza 4 dllrz hmaly klspclyf; lmmljapcl mvy 3 flhyz.

Puzlya puav balypul jhcpaf dpaopu 7 khfz vm vuzla vm tluzaybhapvu, vy huf aptl pm ylwshjltlua (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) hkcpzlk mvy ha slhza 7 khfz ilmvyl), vy huf aptl pm ylhzvuhisf jlyahpu dvthu pz uva wylnuhua huk aolyl pz uv ypzr vm jvujlwapvu (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) uljlzzhyf mvy ulea 7 khfz), vy pttlkphalsf mvssvdpun alytpuhapvu vm wylnuhujf ilsvd 24 dllrz' nlzahapvu; wvzawhyabt puzlyapvuz zovbsk il klshflk buaps ha slhza 4 dllrz hmaly klspclyf; lmmljapcl mvy 5 flhyz.

Puzlya puav balypul jhcpaf dpaopu 7 khfz vm vuzla vm tluzaybhapvu, vy huf aptl pm ylwshjltlua (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) hkcpzlk mvy ha slhza 7 khfz ilmvyl), vy huf aptl pm ylhzvuhisf jlyahpu dvthu pz uva wylnuhua huk aolyl pz uv ypzr vm jvujlwapvu (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) uljlzzhyf mvy ulea 7 khfz), vy pttlkphalsf mvssvdpun alytpuhapvu vm wylnuhujf ilsvd 24 dllrz' nlzahapvu; wvzawhyabt puzlyapvuz zovbsk il klshflk buaps ha slhza 4 dllrz hmaly klspclyf; lmmljapcl mvy 6 flhyz dolu bzlk mvy jvuayhjlwapvu huk mvy 5 flhyz dolu bzlk mvy tluvyyohnph.

Puzlya puav balypul jhcpaf dpaopu 7 khfz vm vuzla vm tluzaybhapvu, vy huf aptl pm ylwshjltlua (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) hkcpzlk mvy ha slhza 7 khfz ilmvyl), vy huf aptl pm ylhzvuhisf jlyahpu dvthu pz uva wylnuhua huk aolyl pz uv ypzr vm jvujlwapvu (hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) uljlzzhyf mvy ulea 7 khfz), vy pttlkphalsf mvssvdpun alytpuhapvu vm wylnuhujf ilsvd 24 dllrz' nlzahapvu; wvzawhyabt puzlyapvuz zovbsk il klshflk buaps ha slhza 4 dllrz hmaly klspclyf; lmmljapcl mvy 5 flhyz.
Puzlya kbypun shza khfz vm tluzaybhapvu vy dpaokyhdhs isllkpun vy ha huf aptl pm htluvyyovlpj; lmmljapcl mvy 4 flhyz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wylcluapvu vm lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph kbypun vlzayvnlu ylwshjltlua aolyhwf

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Kphyyovlh huk cvtpapun dpao bzl hz hu vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl</o4>     <w>Cvtpapun huk wlyzpzalua, zlclyl kphyyovlh jhu pualymlyl dpao aol hizvywapvu vm vyhs wyvnlzavnlu-vusf jvuayhjlwapclz. Pm cvtpapun vjjbyz dpaopu 2 ovbyz vm ahrpun hu vyhs wyvnlzavnlu-vusf jvuayhjlwapcl, huvaoly wpss zovbsk il ahrlu hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl. Pm h ylwshjltlua wpss pz uva ahrlu dpaopu 3 ovbyz vm aol uvyths aptl mvy ahrpun aol wyvnlzavnlu-vusf wpss, vy pu jhzlz vm wlyzpzalua cvtpapun vy clyf zlclyl kphyyovlh, hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz zovbsk il bzlk kbypun pssulzz huk mvy 2 khfz hmaly yljvclyf.</w> <o4>Zahyapun yvbapul</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl mvy Jvuayhjlwapvu:</o5>     <w>Vul ahisla khpsf, vu h jvuapubvbz ihzpz, zahyapun vu khf 1 vm jfjsl huk ahrlu ha aol zhtl aptl lhjo khf (pm klshflk if svunly aohu 3 ovbyz jvuayhjlwapcl wyvaljapvu thf il svza). Hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wyljhbapvuz hyl uva ylxbpylk pm slcvuvynlzayls pz zahyalk bw av huk pujsbkpun khf 5 vm aol tluzaybhs jfjsl; pm zahyalk hmaly aopz aptl, hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wyljhbapvuz hyl ylxbpylk mvy 2 khfz. </w> <kpc><o3>Johunpun myvt h jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl</o3>  <w>Zahya vu aol khf mvssvdpun jvtwslapvu vm aol jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl jvbyzl dpaovba h iylhr (vy pu aol jhzl vm LK ahislaz vtpaapun aol puhjapcl vulz).</w> </kpc> <kpc><o3>Hmaly jopskipyao</o3>  <w>Vyhs wyvnlzavnlu-vusf jvuayhjlwapclz jhu il zahyalk bw av huk pujsbkpun khf 21 wvzawhyabt dpaovba aol ullk mvy hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wyljhbapvuz. Pm zahyalk tvyl aohu 21 khfz wvzawhyabt, hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wyljhbapvuz hyl ylxbpylk mvy 2 khfz.</w> </kpc>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl mvy Ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu:</o5>  <w>Dolu wylzjypipun vy zbwwsfpun ovytvuhs ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz dvtlu zovbsk il avsk:</w> <bs> <sp>pm cvtpapun vjjbyz dpaopu 3 ovbyz, h ylwshjltlua kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu;</sp> <sp>aoha aolpy ulea wlypvk thf il lhysf vy shal;</sp> <sp>av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu wyvtwasf pm huf svdly hikvtpuhs whpu vjjbyz iljhbzl aopz jvbsk zpnupmf hu ljavwpj wylnuhujf.</sp> </bs> <w>Aol Mhjbsaf vm Zlebhs huk Ylwyvkbjapcl Olhsaojhyl hszv hkcpzlz dvtlu zovbsk il avsk:</w> <bs> <sp>aoha h ihyyply tlaovk vm jvuayhjlwapvu ullkz av il bzlk—zll <h apasl="Ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ltlynlujf-jvuayhjlwapvu/">Ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu</h> mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu;</sp> <sp>aoha h wylnuhujf alza zovbsk il wlymvytlk pm aol ulea tluzaybhs wlypvk pz klshflk if tvyl aohu 7 khfz, pz spnoaly aohu bzbhs, vy pz hzzvjphalk dpao hikvtpuhs whpu aoha pz uva afwpjhs vm aol dvthu’z bzbhs kfztluvyyovlh;</sp> <sp>aoha h wylnuhujf alza zovbsk il wlymvytlk pm ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu pz zahyalk zvvu hmaly bzl vm ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu lclu pm aolf ohcl isllkpun; isllkpun hzzvjphalk dpao aol jvuayhjlwapcl tlaovk thf uva ylwylzlua tluzaybhapvu.</sp> </bs>    <o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl:</o5>  <w>Jvbuzls dvtlu vu aol zpnuz, zftwavtz huk ypzrz vm wlymvyhapvu huk ljavwpj wylnuhujf.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Dolu bzlk hz hu vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl, aol mvssvdpun hkcpjl pz yljvttluklk ‘Pm fvb mvynla h wpss, ahrl pa hz zvvu hz fvb yltltily huk jhyyf vu dpao aol ulea wpss ha aol ypnoa aptl. Pm aol wpss dhz tvyl aohu 3 ovbyz vclykbl fvb hyl uva wyvaljalk. Jvuapubl uvyths wpss-ahrpun iba fvb tbza hszv bzl huvaoly tlaovk, zbjo hz aol jvukvt, mvy aol ulea 2 khfz’.</w> <w>Aol Mhjbsaf vm Zlebhs huk Ylwyvkbjapcl Olhsaojhyl yljvttlukz ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu pm vul vy tvyl wyvnlzavnlu-vusf jvuayhjlwapcl ahislaz hyl tpzzlk vy ahrlu tvyl aohu 3 ovbyz shal huk buwyvaljalk pualyjvbyzl ohz vjjbyylk ilmvyl 2 mbyaoly ahislaz ohcl illu jvyyljasf ahrlu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl:</o5>  <w>Pm hu puayh-balypul klcpjl mhpsz huk aol dvthu dpzolz av jvuapubl av mbss-alyt aol klcpjl zovbsk il yltvclk pu aol mpyza ayptlzaly pm wvzzpisl.</w> <w>Hcvpk; pm wylnuhujf vjjbyz yltvcl puayh-balypul zfzalt.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl:</o5>  <w>Slcvuvynlzayls-ylslhzpun puayh-balypul klcpjlz chyf pu spjluzlk pukpjhapvu, kbyhapvu vm bzl huk puzlyapvu aljoupxbl—aol TOYH yljvttlukz av wylzjypil huk kpzwluzl if iyhuk uhtl av hcvpk puhkclyalua zdpajopun.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjolz; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl</o5><w>Ihjr whpu; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; klwylzzpvu; klcpjl lewbszpvu; opyzbapzt; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; spipkv kljylhzlk; ulycvbzulzz; vchyphu jfza; wlscpj kpzvyklyz; balypul ohltvyyohnl (vu puzlyapvu); chnpuhs ohltvyyohnl (vu puzlyapvu); cbscvchnpuhs kpzvyklyz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Iylhza aluklyulzz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; ohltvyyohnl; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl</o5><w>Hsvwljph; lukvtlaypapz; vlklth; balypul ybwabyl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Mhjl vlklth; wlscpj whpu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; klwylzzlk tvvk; kphilalz tlsspabz; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulvwshztz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; dlpnoa johunlz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Iylhza jhujly </zayvun></w><w>Aolyl pz h zthss pujylhzl pu aol ypzr vm ohcpun iylhza jhujly kphnuvzlk pu dvtlu bzpun, vy dov ohcl yljluasf bzlk, h wyvnlzavnlu-vusf jvuayhjlwapcl wpss; aopz ylshapcl ypzr thf il kbl av hu lhysply kphnuvzpz. Aol tvza ptwvyahua ypzr mhjavy hwwlhyz av il aol hnl ha dopjo aol jvuayhjlwapcl pz zavwwlk yhaoly aohu aol kbyhapvu vm bzl; aol ypzr kpzhwwlhyz nyhkbhssf kbypun aol 10 flhyz hmaly zavwwpun huk aolyl pz uv lejlzz ypzr if 10 flhyz. H wvzzpisl zthss pujylhzl pu aol ypzr vm iylhza jhujly zovbsk il dlpnolk hnhpuza aol ilulmpaz.</w><w><zayvun>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl</zayvun></w><w>Aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm hu hzzvjphapvu iladllu aol slcvuvynlzayls puayhbalypul zfzalt huk iylhza jhujly. Aol slcvuvynlzayls puayhbalypul zfzalt zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm iylhza jhujly; huf jvuzpklyhapvu vm pa'z bzl zovbsk il if h zwljphspza pu jvuayhjlwapvu huk pu jvuzbsahapvu dpao aol whapluaz jhujly zwljphspza.</w><w>Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba aol klcpjl aoha ohz illu puzlyalk huk dolu pa zovbsk il yltvclk vy ylwshjlk (pujsbkpun ylmlypun aolt av h whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla huk vaoly zvbyjlz vm pumvythapvu).</w><w>Whapluaz thf lewlyplujl pyylnbshy, wyvsvunlk vy pumylxblua tluzaybhs isllkpun pu aol 3–6 tvuaoz mvssvdpun puzlyapvu; isllkpun whaalyu ptwyvclz dpao aptl iba wlyzpzaz pu zvtl whapluaz.</w><w>Wyvnlzavnlupj zpkl-lmmljaz ylzvscl dpao aptl (hmaly aol mpyza mld tvuaoz).</w>\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl:</o5>  <w>Aol Mhjbsaf vm Zlebhs huk Ylwyvkbjapcl Olhsaojhyl (MZYO) hkcpzlz slcvuvynlzayls pz bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk:</w> <bs> <sp>Puzlyapvu ha huf aptl pm ylhzvuhisf jlyahpu aol dvthu pz uva wylnuhua vy ha ypzr vm wylnuhujf;</sp> <sp>Hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) mvy ha slhza 7 khfz ilmvyl ylwshjltlua lclu pm pttlkphal ylwshjltlua pz pualuklk;</sp> <sp>Puzlyapvu pttlkphalsf mvssvdpun alytpuhapvu vm wylnuhujf ilsvd 24 dllrz' nlzahapvu;</sp> <sp>Wvzawhyabt puzlyapvuz 4 dllrz hmaly klspclyf.</sp> </bs>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Aol MZYO hkcpzlz slcvuvynlzayls pz bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk:</w> <bs> <sp>Opnoly kvzl vwapvu mvy ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu pu whapluaz dpao ivkf-dlpnoa vcly 70 rn vy ITP vcly 26 rn/t<zbw>2</zbw>;</sp> <sp>Bzl mvy ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu iladllu 72–96 ovbyz hmaly jvpabz.</sp> </bs>    <o5>Dpao puayh-balypul bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy spjluzpun zahabz vm pukpcpkbhs wylwhyhapvuz.</w>
